description: This table contains information about payments by the member

columns.name: BENEFIT_USAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the benefit usage record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The date when a benefit usage was recorded.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAYMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The payment type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Check


Credit Card


Cash


No Payment Due


Other


Unpaid

columns.name: RECEIPT_NUM
columns.description: The receipt number for the payment.

columns.name: AMOUNT_PAID
columns.description: The amount paid in the transaction.

columns.name: PAYMENT_NAME
columns.description: The name appearing on check/credit card.

columns.name: CC_EXPIRE
columns.description: The expiration date for credit card.

columns.name: CC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The credit card type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Visa


Discover


American Express


Master Card

columns.name: OTHER_PAYMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The other mode of payment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
